alert.note: Alert for Grant (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:25AM CST until January 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Grant County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
